tool.name: FpocketFilter
tool.description: : Performs a search over the outputs of the fpocket building block.

param.name: input_pockets_zip
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path to all the pockets found by fpocket. Format: [input].zip

param.name: input_summary
param.label: input JSON file
param.help: Path to the JSON summary file returned by fpocket. Format: [input].json

param.name: outname_output_filter_pockets_zip
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path to the selected pockets after filtering Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: score
param.label: score
param.help: List of two float numbers between 0 and 1 indicating the score range. Indicates the fpocket score after the evaluation of pocket prediction accuracy as defined in the fpocket paper. (Json)

param.name: druggability_score
param.label: druggability_score
param.help: List of two float numbers between 0 and 1 indicating the druggability_score range. It's a value between 0 and 1, 0 signifying that the pocket is likely to not bind a drug like molecule and 1, that it is very likely to bind the latter. (Json)

param.name: volume
param.label: volume
param.help: List of two float numbers indicating the volume range. Indicates the pocket volume. (Json)
